atk-s0403a25:2_1: Chaṭṭhassa paṭhame upasampādetabbanti upajjhāyena hutvā upasampādetabbaṁ.
atk-s0403a25:2_2: Dutiye nissayo dātabboti ācariyena hutvā nissayo dātabbo.
atk-s0403a25:2_3: Tatiye sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabboti upajjhāyena hutvā sāmaṇero gahetabbo.
atk-s0403a25:2_4: Iti imāni tīṇipi suttāni paṭhamabodhiyaṁ khīṇāsavavasena vuttāni.
atk-s0403a25:4_1: Bhattuddesakādīnaṁ vinicchayakathā samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṁ (cūḷava. aṭṭha. 325) vuttanayena veditabbāti.
atk-s0403a25:4_2: Sammato na pesetabboti pakatiyā sammato ‘‘gaccha bhattāni uddisāhī’’ti na pesetabbo.
atk-s0403a25:5_2: so tassa bhikkhuno padātabbo’’ti ettha vuttapattaggāhāpako.
atk-s0403a25:6_1: Nigaṇṭhoti purimabhāgappaṭicchanno. Muṇḍasāvakoti nigaṇṭhasāvako. Jaṭilakoti tāpaso.
atk-s0403a25:6_3: Etesaṁ pana sīlesu paripūrakāritāya abhāvena sukkapakkho na gahito. Sesamettha uttānamevāti.
